Christmas Appeal 2023: How Northland locals can help Whangārei Cat Rescue https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/christmas-appeal-2023-how-northland-locals-can-help-the-whangarei-cat-rescue/OOU5SF3DJVAZVDRGCR6DTJI5G4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/christmas-appeal-2023-how-northland-locals-can-help-the-whangarei-cat-rescue/OOU5SF3DJVAZVDRGCR6DTJI5G4/ Karina CooperThe rescue currently has 60 kittens in their care but can take up to 90. Tooth Fairy of Kaikohe fined after low-cost denture service created smiles but broke health rules https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tooth-fairy-of-kaikohe-fined-after-low-cost-denture-service-created-smiles-but-broke-health-rules/NT6X53NNNZFCVO5HHPTPINAO7M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tooth-fairy-of-kaikohe-fined-after-low-cost-denture-service-created-smiles-but-broke-health-rules/NT6X53NNNZFCVO5HHPTPINAO7M/ David FisherTooth fairy Claire Wihongi-Matene fined for low-cost unlicensed denture service. Mon, 11 Dec 2023 16:00:00 +0000 Claire Wihongi-Matene, 44, was dubbed the "tooth fairy" of Kaikohe. Today she was sentenced for providing denture maintenance and manufacture without a licence. Photo / David Fisher
Fake money: Rotorua teen who printed counterfeit notes on home printer sentenced https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/fake-money-rotorua-teen-who-printed-counterfeit-notes-on-home-printer-sentenced/MOCYY2R5E5FHTEBXPKKWWRKCRI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/fake-money-rotorua-teen-who-printed-counterfeit-notes-on-home-printer-sentenced/MOCYY2R5E5FHTEBXPKKWWRKCRI/ Sandra ConchieA Rotorua teenager has avoided prison after he forged banknotes and distributed them wide Mon, 11 Dec 2023 16:00:00 +0000 Counterfeit banknotes forger Amaru Rihia-Tipene, 19, was sentenced in the Rotorua District Court on December 8. Photo / Andrew Warner
School counsellors win $1.79m damages for workplace stress over student suicides, deaths https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/school-counsellors-win-179m-damages-for-workplace-stress-over-student-suicides-deaths/UCTQSR3RHNGFB6YTXPROHPLVI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/school-counsellors-win-179m-damages-for-workplace-stress-over-student-suicides-deaths/UCTQSR3RHNGFB6YTXPROHPLVI/ Natalie AkoorieGuidance counsellors spent decade in legal battle with high school over workplace stress. Mon, 11 Dec 2023 16:00:00 +0000 Former Melville High School guidance counsellors Ron and Kath Cronin-Lampe have won $1.79 million in damages against the school board of trustees for workplace harm and stress after their workload from excessive student suicides, fatal car crashes, terminal illnesses and murder became untenable.
